  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="5674" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="5674" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.18</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1590">1,590</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="203"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Endymion</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men. <b>Endymion</b> was launched in 2003. The nose behind this fragrance is Fragrance Resources. Top notes are Lavender, Bergamot, Sage and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Coffee and Geranium; base notes are Sandalwood, Leather, Cardamon, Myrhh, Nutmeg, Black Pepper, Incense, Musk, Vetiver and Olibanum. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                         </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">29</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Weak gourmandy cologne
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">

                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">32</span></div>

                    </div>
                    Animalic musk notes doesn't mix well with topnotes
                </div>

</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="5674"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='4a2402f532f162eb37b4a201875e8163390' slotpayload='{"ct":"RDWMkETNEA5X0SJEGe3UDaalYsWH2y8\/w4IFggcLUtQ\/r74R8g9pC6cRom877uL3stlRPIkM2IfYxM5frU8owpcV7en1Ewt5ZTxYbm4kBwfUINM7TxAq+zUEjFExu7\/aFKUAAvp1thOYzTSnbObmbkN2II9HL7z498DYyoHodK8SeeOL6C7eocpF0bNVoyjuBMafawwSvWDn6rWTj8CCYrkKNipF2t6Y\/ZpmY7cWJzE25oLaNYfZ4oPTtQnZkjAZh7Aw3r6esZdxDS2hFbBzAIkc9\/brHunkVvayXCCh1GJMUFa0ejZUmqkESprDDVFe","iv":"eda3c71e841317b0dc0d41ef84eb62c4","s":"9d709f8e9c2c70ab"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

  <span>
    This perfume reminds me of
  </span>
</div>
<div class="carousel">
            <div class="carousel-cell">
            <a href="">
                <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.38352.jpg" alt="Endymion Concentr Penhaligon's">
                <span class="brand">Penhaligon's</span>
                <br>Endymion Concentr
            </a>

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2357579" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357579" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brxmxn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brxmxn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357579ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357579" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2305348">Brxmxn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the opening of it is quite basic and sort of sickly to my nose a bit insency for my liking however the dry down is absolutely amazing and I love smelling it every time if only the start was more like it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354709" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sssaaammm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266711"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2266711.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sssaaammm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Blazing-Mr-Sam-50255.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50255.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Blazing Mr Sam"title="The Blazing Mr Sam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354709ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354709" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2266711">sssaaammm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 16:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells quite basic but done to a high quality, never a fragrance that I would smell and instantly know what it is, but never something that I would turn my nose to</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2354709"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2354709#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341038" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pouhon130R"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289136"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2289136.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pouhon130R" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/Au-Coeur-du-Desert-41053.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41053.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Au Coeur du Dsert"title="Au Coeur du Dsert"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289136">Pouhon130R</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorite scents in the collection. It's extremely versatile and suitable for all ages. I love the lavender undertone and the cardamom in the drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2341038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2341038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331099" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Oud-84012.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84012.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Oud"title="Polo Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 03:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#946 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
The second this hit my nose I thought I was smelling the original Gucci Pour Homme. But it could also be Carolina Herrera "212", or Salvador Dali "Laguna Homme" or Oscar de La Renta "Pour Lui", or Yves de Sistelle "Thallium", Halloween Man "X", Mauboussin "Homme", Calvin Klein "Eternity", Antonio Puig "Aqua Brava", Jacques Bogart's "Silver Scent" line, a couple of the Lanvin's, a few of the Alfred Dunhills, O Boticario Malbecs, Original Penguins, all freshie EDTs I packed up and gave to the men's shelter last Christmas. I wasn't wearing them, not because they weren't nice scents, but because they lack any staying power. I never wore them, because they wouldn't last through a speed date.  <br />
<br />
When a scent features fifteen plus notes, I call them "kitchen sink" scents. The perfumer literally throws in everything they have in the lab, like a kid with a new chemistry kit, just to see what happens. And what usually happens is you smell a hint of everything you like, just not a lot of it and not for very long. It won't offend anyone, but it will also be a weak performer, recognized by no one, lacking any identifiable character. And that's what we have here. It's a nice scent. All of the above are nice scents. They just don't last. Projection is weak, no more than an hour. Two hours as a skin scent tops. Basically this is an $20 EDT, not a $160 EDP. Likeable but lame. So won't be a bottle buy for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2331099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2331099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sharkspark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191037"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191037.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="sharkspark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Essential-Parfums/Bois-Imperial-64338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Imprial"title="Bois Imprial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191037">sharkspark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 15:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought in 2024, the leather must be in the other room cause its faint, but for me that's preferred. <br />
To me this smells as if I wore a Chanel eau de parfum (bleu or so) the day before and nearly sweated it off after walking around in the sun after a haircut where the aftershave dried off a bit. The smell of the leather chair in a barber shop, particularly the part where the neck rests on, that is this smell when I sprayed it in my elbow about 4 times. overall = 2.7/5 stars</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2330530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2330530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320041" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284052" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="axelsniff86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2047209"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2047209.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="axelsniff86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/The-Most-Wanted-66826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Most Wanted"title="The Most Wanted"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284052ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284052" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2047209">axelsniff86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice aroma. You get that spicy cardamom that gets you wanting more. Unfortunately, it doesn't last more than 4 hours on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2284052"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2284052#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2270421" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Oli G"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317686"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1317686.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Oli G" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Light-Blue-Forever-pour-Homme-66556.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66556.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"title="Light Blue Forever pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2270421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2270421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317686">Oli G</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-03">09/03/24 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like Terre d'Hermes mixed with Dolce &amp; Gabbana The One. Ambery, spicy/fresh, gentlemanly, and sophisticated.<br />
<br />
It's lovely but it's not worth the price. Performance low-medium.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2270421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2270421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254286" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suleskerryselkie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226488"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="suleskerryselkie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254286ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254286" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2226488">suleskerryselkie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 11:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening notes are masculine, and pleasant but a little unexceptional. Once settled they become a comforting mixture of coffee and lavender with something warmer and slightly spiced underneath, although perfumes usually turn sweeter and more powdery on my skin, so I can see someone else having a completely different reaction. According to peer review this scent does not come across as masculine on me after the first five minutes, although it does on my partner. I love it, but would not recommend it as a blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2254286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2254286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232517" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanaC"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.75237.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanaC" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/75237">tanaC</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 05:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion Penhaligon's<br />
<br />
Endymion is spicy-amber scent, woodsy end. <br />
This smell like Gillette shaving cream to my nose.<br />
The way Endymion build up amber-material to be cream like,<br />
With sweetness from Tonka bean, While Lavender gives relaxing vibe.<br />
This is truly barbershop-estique.<br />
<br />
I added Endymion to my collection as it is uncomplicated, clean, sweet relaxing vibe.<br />
It gives good staying power for 3-4 hours, good projection for 30-40 mins before stay on skin.<br />
with - Woody / vetiver powdery vibes and lavender ambient, lite myrrh touch.<br />
<br />
Endymion shows me fluidity between Amber-spicy And aromatic-Fougere that Barbershop-estique scent. doesn't truly need Fougere element, <br />
Actually it can be either family as long as it have a Hefty does of Lavender<br />
on powdery (either amber or woody) material.<br />
<br />
I like it.<br />
<br />
Hedione filler is good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2232517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2232517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts long on me despite being an edc.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2185182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2185182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184489" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I bought it back in 2003 so it has sentimental value to me. This was a conscious purchase for a date. One of the first dates, the first scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2184489"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2184489#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174622" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174622" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zahraa555"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1240748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zahraa555" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Shalimar-Souffle-de-Parfum-26132.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.26132.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Shalimar Souffle de Parfum"title="Shalimar Souffle de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174622ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174622" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1240748">Zahraa555</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aromatic and fresh. Lavender and citrus with a smokey dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2174622"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2174622#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lostnose2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lostnose2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834">lostnose2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-27">05/27/24 06:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lavender and coffee fizz. Not a bomb. Which is a shame. Nice gentleman fragrance.  For me I do not get a lot of the myrhh and musk. I wish I did. Such a huge list of notes but doesn't seem as complex as listed. Overpriced in ratio to performance.  I do enjoy the scent but with the cost and what I miss, I can't justify a full bottle.  Right along the lines of Penhaligon's for dapper gents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2169143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2169143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126926" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126926" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Turtle2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1962244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Turtle2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Halfeti-Leather-61523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Halfeti Leather"title="Halfeti Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126926ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126926" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1962244">Turtle2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 19:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion holds a special place in my heart less as its the first cologne I ever bought and more the story behind it. Like most guys growing up in the late 2000s I was obsessed with Lynx (Axe for those across the pond) body spray. And naturally being the absolute yob I was then, bathed myself in the stuff to the point that you could smell me half a kilometer away.<br />
<br />
Then one day I went to visit my granddad's and minus a few politically incorrect terms, he proceeded to drag me over to the local shopping centre for a "real man's cologne and not that spay can garbage"<br />
<br />
And there I was introduced to Penhaligon's. Granddad chatted up the old bluenose running the shop and gave him the short of it, and I was given a few scents to try. Eventually it came down to either Opus 1870 or Endymion. Granddad suggested Endymion because he liked the lavender coffee and incense combo. He on the other hand got himself a 10mL atomizer sample of Lord George. 8 years later I still have that bottle of Endymion and his sample atomizer too after he passed away.<br />
<br />
But granddad had a good eye, or rather a good nose I suppose. Endymion a highly versatile scent that's both office safe and good for wearing out; it can be worn year round but does tend to perform best in spring/fall and to a lesser extent summer. I've been told it makes me smell bookish but it has a calming, confidence boosting effect on me. Longevity has always been an issue with Endymion for sure, but some excessive spritzes go a long way with improving duration considering it is an EDC and not an EDT and if not, keep a bit on hand in an atomizer at school or the office..<br />
<br />
So to summarize, Endymion is a safe blind buy for both first timers and frag vets who tire of the more avant garde. Traditionally British yet modern at the same time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2126926"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2126926#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2113099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113099" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JaySentz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1995085.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JaySentz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/African-Leather-31383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="African Leather"title="African Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085">JaySentz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-03">04/03/24 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple lavender cleaner with a little bit of sweetness. Not as complex as the base notes would seem to indicate. Reminds me of a hotel room where they just cleaned the floor.  Not bad by any means, especially if you like clean uncomplicated scents. The listed base notes could have made this more interesting if they were more noticeable.  <br />
<br />
Ok projection for the first hour but then dropped off quickly. Probably good in heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2113099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2113099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110051" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110051" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jessyux3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jessyux3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tamburins/Chamo-78952.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78952.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chamo"title="Chamo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110051ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110051" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414607">jessyux3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-31">03/31/24 14:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love this for a cologne. Sweet musky lavender coffee in the library with old worn out books and leather bindings. Masculine yet soft. Even speakeasy vibes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2110051"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2110051#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2097916" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ricarvic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/172373"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.172373.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ricarvic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Elysium-Pour-Homme-Parfum-Cologne-46296.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46296.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"title="Elysium Pour Homme Parfum Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2097916ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2097916" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); Still extremely good, just somewhat weak!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2097916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2097916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A lot of modest character.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2081680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2081680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2036308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2036308" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nose_Bleed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1242493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nose_Bleed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Aura-Mugler-45639.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45639.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aura Mugler"title="Aura Mugler"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2036308ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2036308" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242493">Nose_Bleed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-20">01/20/24 02:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>genuinely dislike it. came out in 2003 and it shows. aged terribly of not fault of its own. i smelled too many ultra cheap discounter shower gels and shaving creams with a very similar scent profile. its mainly the opening that puts me off but the middle and base are honestly nothing to write home about either because this cologne is so fleeting and short lived. I also dont get any coffee whatsoever. it blasts off in the opening and practically completely vanishes once the top notes are exhausted. smells better on skin than on paper but yeah just a more well blended scent profile similar to a discounter showergel. really dissapointed. strong early 2000s vibes and if you like that good for you, terribly dated and overdone by now to me tho</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2036308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2036308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035876" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KenanC_C"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1612548"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1612548.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KenanC_C" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1612548">KenanC_C</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-19">01/19/24 13:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Can barely smell anything, had to put the paper on my nose to smell it. Its a gentle lavender fragrance with a hint of spices.... 5/10 wish it project better</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2035876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2035876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2006396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006396" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sweet piglet of smoke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/867822"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.867822.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sweet piglet of smoke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pascal-Morabito/Bois-Pluie-42095.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42095.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois & Pluie"title="Bois & Pluie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006396ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006396" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/867822">sweet piglet of smoke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm on my second bottle, rounding the corner to third. Endymion is traditional yet progressive. It is old-fashioned yet in a modern way. It works in casual settings and the most formal. You could wear this to a job interview or a funeral. You can wear this in the morning for coffee, at night to a Michelin starred restaurant. It is incapable of being oversprayed. It is sweet but never cloying or even close to being cloying. It has universal appeal like nothing I've ever worn. I'm not calling it an all-rounder, even though it is. I'm saying it is close to a perfect formulation.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2006396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2006396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005121" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/722631"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.722631.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005121ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005121" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/722631">rum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 06:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not being a Penhaligon's fan (the brand has recently become associated with a tourist souvenir shop, targeted at people who have never visited the UK before) - and detesting powdery scents - it took me a while to appreciate Endymion.<br />
<br />
Endymion falls bang in the 'clean' domain, but it does the 'clean' accord in a different way to any other scent I know of. There is no explosion of citrus or neroli here; instead lavender is the backbone of the scent. It is woven with bergamot in the opening and a faux coffee and geranium in the heart. I say faux coffee because I haven't come across a scent that does coffee just how it smells (to my nose) in a coffee cup or from a freshly opened bag of beans. That said, the coffee note here is impressive and works better than say MFK's Amyris Homme duo.<br />
<br />
The opening can be a bit of a challenge, so I always go easy on the trigger with this one. Once the scent is settled in to that complex base, it really shines. This is especially true in the cooler months and specifically at night, where the resins and spices come to life, but do not become overpowering (unless you've done too many sprays). The current bottles project moderately and last a working day; the scent does not need to be topped up. <br />
<br />
All in all, Endymion is quite a masculine creation, fresh/clean and yet spicy, with an adequate (not too bitter, not too sweet) incense in the base. A great cool weather 'pick me up' for longer nights and when a citrus-laden freshie just won't do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="2005121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=2005121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1993079" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Owen Bawn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740382"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740382.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Owen Bawn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Touch-for-Men-815.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.815.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Touch for Men"title="Touch for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1993079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1993079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740382">Owen Bawn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-05">12/05/23 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Difficult for traditional and conservative heritage houses like Floris or Penhaligon's to create new fragrances that address contemporary sensibilities while being faithful to the house's tradition. The weight of history, one might say. I think that Penhaligon's have lost this in recent years, starting with Sartorial and the Halfetis and the Babylons. By the time you get to the plastic elephant and canine headed bottle caps they've totally lost me. Sartorial is a very nice fragrance; I have it and use it somewhat frequently through the colder months. But it doesn't seem like Penhaligon's. It seems American. Department store fragrance counter American. Sharp, metallic American frags are fine, but they have no connection to 19th century London. As I said, it isn't easy being a heritage house. I don't envy Penhaligon's in this regard.<br />
<br />
But Endymion fits that tradition while also being contemporary. Such an ethereal fragrance that somehow makes leather whisper rather than shout. It has a delightful cycle from top notes through dry down. I'm comfortable wearing it to work but it's also a perfect cool evening choice. It shimmers like the strings in Mahler's Symphony #2. Gentle and versatile.  Spray it on and go out to watch the northern lights. It's what I imagine the aurora smells like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1993079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1993079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992536" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1992536" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnanZ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528354"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1528354.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnanZ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Herms"title="Terre d'Herms"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1992536ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1992536" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1528354">AnanZ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-04">12/04/23 17:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Updated review: It starts off smelling like a generic male frangrance. Aromatic, fresh and spicy<br />
<br />
then it gets smokier. more depth. the base notes of incense and myrrh starts to come through. The smells reminds me of old books in an ancient library and I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1992536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1992536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1991384" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1991384" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DapperDon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614689"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DapperDon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1991384ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1991384" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614689">DapperDon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-03">12/03/23 10:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If Boy Chanel &amp; Allure Homme Sport &amp; Guess Seductive Homme has a 3-way bang!!<br />
10ML authentic sample:<br />
The musky dry down almost bakery-gourmand orange from Allure Sport + the powdery talcum barbershop of Boy.. also a lite sweetness in Guess.<br />
This is my cup of tea. <br />
Amazing lite, airy dapper fragrance. Extremely pleasant well composed aroma.<br />
The way the fragrance changes is like water (a small stream).. smooth, flowing &amp; tame.<br />
First 10sec. I thought ok heres another generic floral opening.. then it immediately started to warm up &amp; I said oh, ok! mmm. After awhile a proper fluffy, cozy cloud of talcum whisped in taking me to my happy place. <br />
Edit 12/19/23: full bottle purchase- 2021 batch-<br />
The Guess comparison is very evident today.. the underlying sweetness is less pleasant &amp; almost too much, but tolerable since its soft. Guess I sprayed too much.<br />
Its like a cousin of the newer batches of La Nuit, but in a less date night kind of way. <br />
<br />
I sense a batch variation. The 10ml sample was absolutely fantastic &amp; everything I wanted in a mans fragrance.. the full bottle was a bit different. The nutmeg, sandalwood &amp; coffee is not there &amp; isnt as dapper. Its sweeter, but still good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1991384"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1991384#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1984984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1984984" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Homineeae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905141"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Homineeae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1984984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1984984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905141">Homineeae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-25">11/25/23 11:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion from Penhaligon's is the kind of scent that's both easygoing and stylish. It starts off with a zesty zing of bergamot  kind of like a fresh, sunny morning. Then, it gets more interesting with a mix of sage and lavender, which makes it feel laid-back but still pretty classy. What I really like about it is the subtle kick of leather and nutmeg that comes through after a while. It's not too in-your-face, but it adds a nice, cozy warmth to the fragrance. It's the kind of cologne you can wear just about anywhere  whether you're heading out for coffee or to a nice dinner. Endymion is like that cool, easy-to-get-along-with friend whos always up for anything, making you feel good and adding just the right touch of sophistication to your day</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1984984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1984984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927962" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927962" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Eau-de-Rochas-2361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rochas"title="Eau de Rochas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927962ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927962" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923">COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 13:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think I need to cleanse my nose palette because the last two Penhaligon fragrances have smelled like petrol. This smells pretty good.  It reminds me of another more common scent whose name has escaped me.  I get a lotion leather scent with a tinge of gasoline here and there.  While the gas note isn't the most pleasant, especially during the opening spray, it mellows a bit to a decent fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1927962"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1927962#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
