In a few minutes it came to incense and leather. Not a bad mix, but as many mentioned, other brands offer much better value to dollar ratio and performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1926335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1926335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1906431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1902323" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JLH76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1453458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JLH76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ajmal/Tonka-56396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tonka"title="Tonka"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1902323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1902323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453458">JLH76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-14">08/14/23 18:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely scent, not very distinctive.  2-3 hours tops, pretty weak. (I've had poor longevity from all the Penhaligon I've tried, especially for the price.)<br />
But it's also quality scent components.  Not bad, not memorable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1902323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1902323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1882850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1882850" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stefavramoglou"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620073"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="stefavramoglou" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1882850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1882850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1620073">stefavramoglou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-20">07/20/23 05:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I used this one in the gym this past winter. Very nice, pleasant, opulent. Poor performance as it is an eau de cologne, but it is expected. I have nice memories with it and would buy it again in the future. 2-3 hours of performance, intimate sillage. Pretty nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1882850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1882850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1876844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stephendd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1657044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stephendd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1876844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1876844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657044">stephendd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 04:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion's aromatic opening reminds me of Acqua di Gio which is not a knock on the creation as it is well done and high in quality. The bergamot and lavender/sage give the fragrance a summer opening but as it begins to dry down, it turns to the notes which would make the scent more suitable for a spring or autumn season. The coffee note isn't very prominent to my nose or to any other person that I have asked which, honestly, is good because coffee notes sometimes are very hit or miss with me. The base notes under a holistic approach give the fragrance a darker* dry down which is great because there is a level of complexity to the fragrance. <br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1876844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1876844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1864885" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dspade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772401"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1772401.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dspade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1864885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1864885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1772401">Dspade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-26">06/26/23 09:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dig this , the scent was nice , kinda powdery , its like some after shower scent with little powdery. Easy to wear . Felt very clean . But the power is weak . Very comforting smell even thou doesnt really get people attention. Never get coffee scent , more to some kind of fruit skins that are little dry . I hope the smell stay longer .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1864885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1864885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1825441" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1825441" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Katchke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Katchke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rose-Eau-De-Parfum-71661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"title="Eau Rose Eau De Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1825441ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1825441" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595035">Katchke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-05">05/05/23 06:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice mens cologne :) it opens really cozy and bright with the fruity and sage notes, I got lots of bergamot and LOTS of sage when I first sprayed it, and as the day went on the leathery/musk and spice notes started to come through and really made it smell like "man smell". Sort of became a run of the mill cologne smell by the end of the day, but has some okay lasting power if you drench yourself :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1825441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1825441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1797294" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1797294" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Serghei Avdonin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522925"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Serghei Avdonin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ex-Nihilo/Fleur-Narcotique-Extrait-de-Parfum-75061.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75061.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fleur Narcotique Extrait de Parfum"title="Fleur Narcotique Extrait de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1797294ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1797294" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1522925">Serghei Avdonin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-31">03/31/23 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>May be I am just not a fan of Penhaligons, but its reminding me lavender toilet spray air fresheners.<br />
Something too synthetic in all those fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1797294"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1797294#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1796221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1796221" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mlke"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417787"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1417787.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mlke" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1796221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1796221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1417787">mlke</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-30">03/30/23 07:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initially I was reminded of Burberry Touch with the musky mandarin and nutmeg combo, but it's not so similar since testing both. I also see Meidum in the suggestions, but that leans into designer amber accords more, and I found it kinda boring and replaceable with something from YSL or Histoires de Parfums. This stays cool and fresh and the lavender doesn't intrude too harshly, smelling very clean cut in the way most Penhaligon's do- gentle, sophisticated, absent of any hard edges, very agreeable and not indulging in anything too wild and untamed, boxed up in a very casual and easy-going style. I haven't tried any of the Portraits collection, so maybe that's where they go deeper and more daring, but the rest of the men's/unisex line seems to follow that style.<br />
 <br />
Anyways, I really like this but will probably wait for a sale to snatch one up. I'm fond of coffee notes, which lend a bitter, metallic earthiness and play well with other balsamic and citrus things. MFK's Amyris Homme is one example where they also pair it with Mandarin, and Santal Volcanique presents it more plainly to yield a shimmering kind of resonance that feels like cold metal. The more I think of Amyris Homme the more it feels similar, but that's really it's own beast- loud, creamy, and tenacious. Here the mix of incensed woods and cardamom form a singular, comfortable base that becomes darker and slightly sweeter over time, with cool spices always wafting over the top and lingering hues of lavender lending a starchy, freshly laundered shirt type vibe. You could probably interpret the texture there as a faint leather or suede. Once it gets to this spiced-sandalwood drydown I'm not sure if I need it in my collection, but it might be worth a decant because it's my favorite from Penhaligon's so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1796221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1796221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1784591" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1784591" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1784591ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1784591" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-15">03/15/23 22:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very strong scent that the sillage is notable. This could be a second skin scent for a lawyer or businessman. At first it has this sharp bergamot top note but it dissipates into a strong mandarin musk. However it has a powdery scent which melows the citrus notes, the citrus makes the entire perfume last longer on the skin.<br />
<br />
 Cancer Capricorn Aquarius</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1784591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1784591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1765631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1765631" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="derby2169"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1389884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="derby2169" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Histoires-de-Parfums/1899-Hemingway-18846.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18846.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1899 Hemingway"title="1899 Hemingway"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1765631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1765631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389884">derby2169</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-21">02/21/23 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Coming from a Penhaligon's avoider, Endymion is shockingly nice, very very nice, pretty much leagues above anything I have smelled from the house so far.<br />
<br />
The opening is a classic shimmer of lavender, clean slightly soapy and fresh, lavender notoriously contains certain linalool compounds similar to bergamot and that flicker between herbal and citrus is the hallmark of classic colognes. Once that classic shimmer is over (in a few seconds that is), you immediately realize there is something deliciously sweet underneath, first mandarin, then a subtle nutty coffee accord. Cardamom is clearly in the mix together with a light dusting of nutmeg and cinnamon. Resins, hidden ambers, soapy musks and sandalwood compounds and what appears to be a clean variant of patchouli in the base essentially replaces the classic oak moss finish you would expect in a fougere together with a good amount of that sweet yet slightly leathery feel of coumarin/tonka. Overtime it becomes darker, creamier and more leathery, entering almost a slight tobacco direction.<br />
<br />
Stunning, modern yet classic, ethereal yet tenacious, excellent blending, a very effective 'handsome' type scent. I have no problem with the longevity, but 6 hours is excellent for me personally (i don't enjoy anything beyond that), projection is however moderate. I wish every Penhaligon's was this good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1765631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1765631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1762401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1762401" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kiraagold"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1096823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kiraagold" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauerville/Tuberose-Flash-41060.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41060.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tuberose Flash"title="Tuberose Flash"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1762401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1762401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096823">kiraagold</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-17">02/17/23 09:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet oranges out of the bottle, with a bundle of lavender that hovers inside personal space for fifteen minutes.<br />
Then, almost suddenly, the coffee hits, like it was spilled onto the skin, and it's marvelous--supported by gruff spices and leather, almost grumpy, in a normally-nice boss arriving to work late way.<br />
(How can a scent seem both surly and comforting at the same time?)<br />
<br />
Lasts an hour or two, a little longer on cuffs.<br />
<br />
The guy usually fusses when I wear men's cologne, but this one he likes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1762401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1762401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749415" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749415" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fleurie20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.21613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fleurie20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749415ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749415" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613">Fleurie20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 19:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Note to self: very spa-like, as in an aromatic room spray; not something I wanna use as a body perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1749415"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1749415#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1732769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1732769" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lyra.meurer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/241244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.241244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lyra.meurer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-02-3606.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3606.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 02"title="Molecule 02"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1732769ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1732769" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/241244">lyra.meurer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-12">01/12/23 23:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely lovely stuff, even if it is a bit weak. Starts off with a sort of olfactory illusion: smells at first like it's going to be a blue shower gel type cologne. As much as that isn't my thing, this moment is gentle and lovely, consisting of a cool herbal-citrus accord that I mostly attribute to mandarin and lavender. As the top fades, the heart and base come into focus. I personally have never gotten much coffee from Endymion -- it's a rounded edge of the overall blend at best, along with the geranium, the presence of which fluctuates moment to moment. The base is the overriding experience for me, and the lasting impression: creamy nutmeg, warming and incredibly smooth. It smells like warm, spiced milk to me, despite the lack of lactonic notes. The cream, which I attribute to sandalwood and musk, is rounded out by a bit of leather, wafts of vetiver, incense -- it changes constantly, then fades out.<br />
<br />
Endymion could stand to be stronger. The moderate sillage fades to intimate, but the longevity is decent, something like 5-7 hours. I dream of a full bottle, so I could really overspray it and smell delicious and cozy to everyone all day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1732769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1732769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iszzieanna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iszzieanna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234905">iszzieanna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-30">12/30/22 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is beautiful. However, as it is an EDC, its so light and its very difficult to actually smell the fragrance. Opening with coffee, lavender, leather and smelling right out of the barbershop, this reminds me of amethyst haze and at the barbers combined into one scent. The lavender dominates the scent so that the cardamom and coffee dont take over the fragrance. The scent is never too warm or spicy due to this. However the coffee is the smokey, oud-y type of coffee scent and that might throw people off. This is a masculine leaning, unisex fragrance that would smell amazing on the right person.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1721098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1721098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1716959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1716959" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1716959ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1716959" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-25">12/25/22 07:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume grew on me quickly. It strikes me as a good unisex fragrance. I love the medicinal quality of the lavender and I dont usually wear leather note fragrances but this one is quite nice. I cannot smell the coffee, however, because it is blended nicely as Penhaligons perfumes usually are.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1716959"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1716959#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1697777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lavender and coffee is so good its mouthwatering!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1697777"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1697777#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1693343" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's fine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1693343"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1693343#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1691086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1691086" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaiaoh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1397309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaiaoh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1691086ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1691086" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1691086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1691086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1659892" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659892" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PhonePotato"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1224212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PhonePotato" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aaron-Terence-Hughes/Supernova-90884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Supernova"title="Supernova"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659892ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659892" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1224212">PhonePotato</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-05">10/05/22 20:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice, has a late 90s designer smell. Very strong for an edc, but slightly better than average for and edt/edp performance wise. Reminds me of Le Male but with more musk. Sweet lavender and some ambery warmth with light spice, dries down to be less sweet and more incense. Very mass appealing, at least if you like sweet scents and lavender. <br />
<br />
For me a hard pass based on price and performance. I picked up a used bottle for around $40 so that was ok, but if I had paid full price I would of been upset with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1659892"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1659892#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1649943" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1649943" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astrophelian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1561748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astrophelian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1649943ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1649943" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1561748">astrophelian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-21">09/21/22 13:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I adore this scent wholeheartedly, incredibly classy and refreshing. The price is ok if you find one on sale. If this had stronger sillage and better longevity it would be my all-time favorite fresh scent but sadly its performance is only mediocre.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1649943"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1649943#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634659" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1634659" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EllisWade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562185"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1562185.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EllisWade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1634659ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1634659" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1585571" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spitshaw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="spitshaw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1585571ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1585571" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1471472">spitshaw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-16">06/16/22 09:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find this to be kind of unique. Who'd have thought coffee, lavender and orange would go together this well? To be honest sometimes I think it's stunning, but other times I think it smells like cheapo male teen shower gel ala Lynx/Axe. Either way it always evokes memories I can't put my finger on. The worst part is the performance, it's terrible - almost digustingly so. It's the worst performing fragrance I own by a considerable distance. I genuinely can't even get 30 minutes out of it on skin. The concentre version performs better but it doesn't have the same magic. I enjoy the scent though so I end up using it as something to wear out of the shower, I'd certainly wear it more frequently if it lasted.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
