2/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1514289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1514289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1513144" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1513144" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cedrat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242784"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cedrat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nasomatto/Baraonda-40200.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40200.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baraonda"title="Baraonda"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1513144ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1513144" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242784">cedrat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-27">02/27/22 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find that this scent grows on me with each wearing, and each wearing reveals a new facet. Today, I noticed the deep citrus and lavender combination that gives this a surprisingly long-lasting opening. In my first wearings I was struck by the coffee note, which is quite prominent (after Akro Awake, which is the prototypical coffee scent in my book).<br />
<br />
Altogether very pleasant, office-appropriate, gentlemanly fragrance. Dandyish, even.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1513144"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1513144#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1460452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1460452" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ksj_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1113640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ksj_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Instant-de-Guerlain-pour-Homme-52.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"title="L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1460452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1460452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1113640">Ksj_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-09">12/09/21 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy Endymion Concentr by Penhaligon's more. Why? Because I wouldnt consider this a groundbreaking scent and the Concentr version performs better. However, this is still very pleasant in its own way. <br />
<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1460452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1460452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1450586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1450586" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlueMoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlueMoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1450586ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1450586" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/601683">BlueMoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-22">11/22/21 15:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MOCHACCINO + LAVENDAR + A DASH OF BABY POWDER<br />
<br />
This is my 2nd review. My first was about 8 years ago. (And I had completely forgotten I had ever sampled and reviewed this popular Penhaligon.) After so many years my appreciation has evolved. <br />
<br />
The opening is stellar. And although it has such a soft, beautiful, chocolate-coffee-lavendar dry down, I'm not sure if it might just be a tad too powdery for me.<br />
<br />
I'll sleep on it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1450586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1450586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1432072" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1432072" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xyber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229204"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xyber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1432072ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1432072" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229204">Xyber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-21">10/21/21 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>By far my most favourite scent. It doesnt last long, it doesnt project well, light years ahead of concentre (which I love) but its just perfect. Lightly fruity, lightly smokey, lightly aromatic, bigger suede, chocolate and bergamot. Think of suede as a gentle fuzzy leather, that is complimented by the chocolate note, without one, the other wouldnt work. It reminds me of if Johnsons baby powder was leather and chocolate scented, in a more savoury than sweet way, Johnsons man powder. You wear this for yourself. I often do after a shower. Its relaxing and energizing at the same time, it smells familiar but completely different to anything else at the same time. The concentre is really good, but its missing something, the chocolate doesnt linger as long and very little citrus zing I think. If this could be amped up to smell like this, project like a beast and have longevity, it would be amazing. But until that happens, I have to have this Im my stash. Its still an 11/10, love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1432072"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1432072#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1404153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1404153" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.5624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sarah-Jessica-Parker/Stash-SJP-40750.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40750.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Stash SJP"title="Stash SJP"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1404153ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1404153" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/5624">iris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-04">09/04/21 04:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wish there was a special category for this coffee-lavender thing. Yet in this sub-genre, I'd go with New Haarlem over Endymion anytime. Endymion is like the New Haarlem for the impeccable small town British gentleman. Too impeccable in fact: no flaws, no grit, never too sweet, never over the edge, any kind of edge. <br />
The pale moon on the label says it right. Although having enough substance, Endymion surrounds you with its pale blueish light, very romantic, and also very Platonic., no teeth shown at any point. I almost cried the first time I smell it. An idealized, soft barbershop fragrance, the figure of a young man drifting in night air.<br />
Now that i have it, every time after the initial blast of out-of-this-world beauty comes the "So what?" moment, and then I no longer pay attention. I guess that's the point. As others already said, boringly perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1404153"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1404153#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1374105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1374105" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="paycrchf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230344"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="paycrchf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Millesime-Imperial-466.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.466.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Millsime Imprial"title="Millsime Imprial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1374105ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1374105" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230344">paycrchf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-11">07/11/21 04:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a comforting scent. Pleasant fougere. Longevity is below average but its EDC anyway. the EDP is too dark and smoky for me as an everyday scent so I still chose this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1374105"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1374105#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1367520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1367520" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HenryJames24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354185"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HenryJames24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1367520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1367520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1354185">HenryJames24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-28">06/28/21 17:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Way too powdery and sweet. Very old fashioned smelling, like a (clean) grandpa. I can't help but think that if this was less powdery and had a little less coffee, more citrus, and less animalic musk notes it would be fantastic, because there's definitely something there that's good. Not much lavender. Not much generic cologne here either; it somehow doesn't smell like a liquid sprayed on your skin at all, it's almost like a paste you've spread on it.<br />
<br />
Also, there's a strong animalic nature to the musk that doesn't mix well with the topnotes. It does make it feel more masculine, but it feels wrong mixed with coffee. Feels a little too much like I'm a very sweaty barista in a very fancy coffee shop.<br />
<br />
The flowers are there too, and I think they're what makes this scent too feminine, combined with everything else.<br />
<br />
All of this implies I dislike the scent. I don't, really, I like the smell, but it's unwearable on me, and I think it would be unwearable on most men, except maybe grandpas. If it was smoother and less powdery it would be fantastic and unique.<br />
<br />
If you do want to wear it, it has fantastic longevity (I scrubbed it off and it refused to come off even hours after scrubbing) and it's hard to go noseblind to. The projection is also good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1367520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1367520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1363267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1363267" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blossomka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blossomka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1363267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1363267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912">blossomka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-20">06/20/21 16:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>7/10. Violet and lavender mixed with sweet spices like chamomile. I really like it. It brings back memories of afternoon tea houses and sachets. Initially it is a little bit too powdery and when I take a good deep sniff it takes my breath away. This passes and overall it is very pretty. I imagine this as a perfect potpourri scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1363267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1363267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1358984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1358984" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sam654"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sam654" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Imitation-Man-49850.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49850.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imitation Man"title="Imitation Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1358984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1358984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1252820">Sam654</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-12">06/12/21 16:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Citrus in the opening, lavender all way through and a nice blend of the base notes but, sorry no coffee to my nose. The base note listing looks like a train wreck but they come together quite nicely. Im a sucker for olibanum and incentives so thats what attracted me initially. <br />
<br />
Terrific fragrance. This and Creed Bois du Portugal are my favorite barbershop scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1358984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1358984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1354834" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1354834" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lemale83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.71579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lemale83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1354834ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1354834" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/71579">lemale83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-05">06/05/21 02:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful gourmand + fougere  fragrance. Opening has a nice freshness. Its mostly lavender and coffee, it will leave a beautiful scent trail, this one smell much more nicer in the air. I dont get the association with YSL La Nuit de lhomme, however it reminds me Bond No 9 New Harlem and Rochas Man than anything, and some Armani Code vibe as well. I wish it had a better projection, last around 6 hours. Its really a beautiful fragrance and very versatile, office friendly. And beautiful name too...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1354834"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1354834#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1314258" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1314258" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tonkatsu335"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254643.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tonkatsu335" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Linda-Landenberg/A-Trembling-Rose-47015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A Trembling Rose"title="A Trembling Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1314258ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1314258" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643">tonkatsu335</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-26">03/26/21 04:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It makes me feel sick.<br />
It smells like a car fragrance, which is very deliberate.<br />
<br />
The last note is quite different from the top and middle, becoming a subdued leather, but I can't stand it until then.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1314258"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1314258#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1314164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1314164" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Xeryus-861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Xeryus"title="Xeryus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1314164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1314164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-26">03/26/21 00:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was the best blind-buy of my life. This incredibly versatile fragrance from its first blast makes evident the multiple notes in it: I can only single out a few, but the most pleasurable is the nice lavender. Like most lavenders, this gets compared to a barbershop fragrance, but the combination of this with darker scents (e.g. coffee, leather, sandalwood) produces a really lovely and unusual accord. It doesn't last terribly long, nor does the sillage seem all that strong, but it is so heavenly! It is worthy of its celestial name.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1314164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1314164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1290114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1290114" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ilsagold"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.208639.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ilsagold" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1290114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1290114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208639">ilsagold</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-10">02/10/21 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have had the original tester in the past. I loved the scent of it. Coffee note where are you?! Not in here. It acts like a cologne. 2 hours of longevity. Skin scent. Since the price is high for a cologne I didn't buy a full bottle.<br />
A year later I bought the deodorant stick. Not as potent as the cologne and performance were of course poor.<br />
Today I bought as an aftershave balm. Out of three, the scent of the balm is the best. Oh so great. Unfortunately, it stays on the skin for only 20 minutes.<br />
Conclusion: Don't buy deo-stick. Aftershave balm (cheap) and cologne (expensive) is good quality so can be considered.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1290114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1290114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1277802" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1277802" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content=""/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1011553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1011553.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1277802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1277802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1261189" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xilef"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1264112.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xilef" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1261189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1261189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264112">Xilef</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-15">12/15/20 00:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If I had to choose one word for this scent it would easily be 'bakery.' It smells like warm, fresh baked bread, with coffee brewing in the background. Despite having a light gourmand sweetness, it's still decidedly a fougere. While my nose isn't sophisticated enough to individually pick out the other notes I am certain that the lavender, leather, and sandalwood are key players here as they are three of my favorite notes that rarely disappoint me. Endymion is a true gentleman, if not a prince. It's very soft and has a androgynous essence  about it. You are safe to go heavy on the spray. I personally spray all of my fragrances on my chest, as I find that it keeps the smell lingering throughout the day and into the night. Despite complaints of Endymions poor longevity, I find it to be no exception. Perfect on a sweater for your partner to steal. My signature fragrance. 10/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1261189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1261189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1256409" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1256409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1256409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1231537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1231537" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="robin1234"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="robin1234" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Eau-de-Rochas-Homme-5145.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5145.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rochas Homme"title="Eau de Rochas Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1231537ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1231537" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254357">robin1234</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-01">10/01/20 19:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm so fortunate to have the opportunity to try this fragrance. My brother in law who's much more experienced and knowledgeable in fragrance passed this to me. When i tried it for the first time, I was like.. Woo... what's going on here?! The coffee note is a game changer. I have never expected it to blend in so smoothly with the rest of other notes. The lavender, lemon, sage, sandalwood and so many more notes evolve with time smoothly with the coffee note lingering at the background. Simply fantastic! <br />
<br />
Gentlemanly fragrance with a beautiful twist! Overall 9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1231537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1231537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1222023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1222023" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scensitive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1226445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scensitive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Harrods-Aoud-56709.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56709.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Harrods Aoud"title="Harrods Aoud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1222023ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1222023" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226445">scensitive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-08">09/08/20 23:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best coffee fougeres known to man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1222023"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1222023#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1211956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1211956" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpellegrino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.804692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpellegrino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1211956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1211956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/804692">cpellegrino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-15">08/15/20 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Note Breakdown:<br />
<br />
Top: mandarin orange, bergamot, lavender, sage<br />
<br />
Reality: you can actually smell all four specific notes if you look for them. It's impressive. They're all blended together well and nothing seems to overpower the other.<br />
<br />
Middle: geranium and coffee<br />
<br />
Reality: I honestly don't know what a geranium smells like on its own so I can't say. I don't detect coffee at all.<br />
<br />
Base: leather, musk, myrhh (a type of tree resin), vetiver, nutmeg, black pepper, cardamon, sandalwood, incense, olibanum (aka frankincense)<br />
<br />
Reality: the leather is there but it's soft. The musk black pepper + nutmeg, incense, and frankincense are also easily identifiable. It's actually quite smooth for being so spiced. The myrrh is also quite nice.<br />
<br />
Overall: Endymion isn't something I'd typically reach for. It smells like it's for an older man. It would be great in fall/winter. I think this could even be worn in an office environment. It's spiced and strong but still very inoffensive. Like a very expensive body wash.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1211956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1211956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1203783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1203783" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ritch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/997583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.997583.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ritch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1203783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1203783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/997583">ritch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-25">07/25/20 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p><b>THE COFFEE FOUGERE</b><br />
<br />
Did you know that the scent profile of coffee is one of the most complex on earth? Discovering a real love for coffee scents! These dark, rich and mysterious scents just make me happy. <i>Complex and dark Ive got down, rich and mysterious - I guess Ill need to work on that!</i><br />
<br />
<b>COMPOSITION:</b> Endymion flips the usual fougere on its head and adds a can of whhoopass. Lavender takes this out of gourmand terratory, adding a classic soapy feel. The coffee fades a little after the opening and mandarin enters, giving it a slight shower gel vibe, heading a little toward Allure Homme. The myrhh, nutmeg and cardamom give it a touch of mystery. and the leather just adds more badass to the mix. The fade out comes all too quickly though with the coffee now quieter still. From here it dries to a light creamy caramelized woody musk.<br />
<br />
<b>VERDICT:</b> liking this its a great opening though it does fade fast and the drydown isn't as remarkable. As a maturing coffee lover I cant help but be curious to see if theres a darker, richer, spicier take on this that goes from 7.5/10 of this to a 10/10 perhaps even with some oud I gotta find that one coffee scent to rule them all... For some of you though this might fit like a glove, just beware the longevity and less interesting drydown.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1203783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1203783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1199571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1199571" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="langsat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.924102.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="langsat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Charenton-Macerations/Asphalt-Rainbow-30351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Asphalt Rainbow"title="Asphalt Rainbow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1199571ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1199571" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924102">langsat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-14">07/14/20 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For those of us who grew up on Sailor Moon, we probably have an immediate impression to the name "Endymion." Others, recalling Greco-Roman mythology, might recall the goddess of the moon who fell in love with a beautiful man from earth and put him to slumber.<br />
<br />
I've had my eye on Endymion for a while, and I'm grateful to finally try a sample. Endymion is both gentle and genteel. It recalls subtle princes and the quietness of night. Lavender is at the heart. It contains the  familiar notes of fougeres, but it goes beyond the barber shop and holds a slight mystery--just like the moon. The coffee and nutmeg stand out on me, although it's not by any means a gourmand. These notes, along with the myrrh, make it feel warmer.<br />
<br />
While it certainly has a gender neutral appeal, the name and the fougere makeup gives off a soft masculinity. Sillage and longevity are decent. Enough to make an impact, but quiet enough to stay on theme.<br />
<br />
I don't necessarily think Endymion is groundbreaking or extraordinary, but it is perfection in achieving what it set out to do, which sometimes is more rewarding than going the outre route. It is clean, and it is classic, and its understated handsomeness provides just enough mystique to set it out from the rest. I could see myself picking up a full bottle of this in the future.<br />
<br />
Overall, just a lovely scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1199571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1199571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1180209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1180209" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zaca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231844"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1231844.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zaca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/A-Men-705.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.705.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A*Men"title="A*Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1180209ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1180209" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1231844">Zaca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-25">05/25/20 18:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are several fragrances I consider quintessential gentlemens scents and Penhaligons is the best of these. <br />
<br />
Endymion opens with a soft mandarin supported by lavender and almost impercetible sage. Its nice at this stage but where Endymion comes into its own is its heart: a creamy coffee with shavings of nutmeg and lightly crushed cardamom, although the classic masculine notes of leather and lavender keep it going into foodie territory. I hesitate to use the term chai latte, because here the use of coffee and edible spices is more restrained than that. Endymion comes to a rest on a cosy sandalwood-light incense base. <br />
<br />
Even though its marketed for men Endymion is easily unisex and the text on the sample packaging even hints at such: beloved by both dapper gentleman and adventurous ladies.<br />
<br />
Penhaligons fragrances have a reputation for poor longevity but Endymion keeps humming along in the background, never intrusive, for most of the day. <br />
<br />
The original Endymion smells great on clothing, so if youre in the early days of courtship the object of your affection may steal your jumper so she can smell it when youre not around. The king of gentlemans scents and perfect for the girlfriend or wife to borrow and enjoying its comforting, creamy coffee warmth on a relaxing Sunday winter morning.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1180209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1180209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1150493" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1150493" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="swevery"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1228528.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="swevery" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1150493ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1150493" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1228528">swevery</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-29">02/29/20 03:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My gateway fragrance that piqued my interest in fragrances. Where I first learned fragrances could smell like actual materials and not just weird vague cologne-y or flowery smells. I have emptied a bottle and a 30ml, about 1/3rd through my second. Opens with bergamot and lavender, then leather and coffee come through. <br />
<br />
Performance is spotty, as other people say. Sometimes it lasts all day and sometimes it's gone in an hour. Will always have a place in my heart but I think I'm going to move on to repurchasing the concentre (which I also have and love).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1150493"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1150493#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1142298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1142298" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bleukreuz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218467"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1218467.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bleukreuz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1142298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1142298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218467">bleukreuz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-02-06">02/06/20 08:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The very first Penhaligon's I bought. Very fresh, clean, and pleasant smelling. The lavender is quite masculine and have barbershop quality. Perfect for office. I don't get any coffee whatsoever. Only lasted until lunchtime which I guess is OK given it is advertised as a cologne. I do love the aesthetic of the bottle and box!<br />
<br />
I bought the 100mL at a 30mL price - must be a wrong listing - but the store's loss is my gain :D</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1142298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1142298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1101315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1101315" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marwaniq"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200433"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1200433.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marwaniq" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1101315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1101315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1200433">marwaniq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-09-26">09/26/19 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its a nice/calm fragrance. has that fresh sauvage kinda vibe. i like it but i cant imagine myself buying it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1101315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1101315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1085107" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1085107" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pempipot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1178494.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pempipot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Cafe-Tuberosa-45964.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45964.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Caf Tuberosa"title="Caf Tuberosa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1085107ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1085107" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178494">Pempipot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-08-06">08/06/19 02:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An interesting scent, but I'm having a hard time wrapping my head/nose around it. It opens with strong lavender and citrus, has a  twist of coffee and some spices... it's not easy to pinpoint exact ingredients in this one and my feeling is that of an overcomplicated Lavandula which somehow wants to turn what is fresh (lavender and citrus) warm, by adding spices and coffee. <br />
It's an interesting take on the classic lavender, but nothing groundbreaking in ANY way. I don't fully understand the hype around this perfume, if I have to be sincere. It is good, but I would have loved it more if it was more woody.<br />
<br />
The problem with me starts after 15 minutes or so. There's something extremely metallic in it that deeply troubles me. The only other scent that ever gave me the same thing is Kurkdjian 's Gentle Fluidity which is completely different from this one, so I do not understand what this might me. <br />
<br />
I'd suggest to try this out before buying it, because it's quite complex and note necessarily for everyone.<br />
<br />
I'd also suggest to stop adding gender roles to reviews because this is sometime offensive and almost always not useful to anyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1085107"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1085107#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1083228" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1083228" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DCE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/929660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.929660.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DCE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tiziana-Terenzi/Kirke-32172.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32172.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kirke"title="Kirke"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1083228ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1083228" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/929660">DCE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-30">07/30/19 10:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought a selection of Penhaligons for try out, this was one of them.<br />
<br />
Its a fresh scent, but to me, i get Heather, with a hint of lavender, and a dose of the citrus right from the start.<br />
The lavender smooths out and comes to the front a little more during dry down, and i get hints of Geranium and and a little pepper.<br />
Thats it. The cacophony of notes listed seem like theyre walk on parts nobody sees. I get zero leather or incense, so not sure about them.<br />
<br />
Longevity and sillage seem incredibly poor for such a prestige perfumer, i honestly can say this is a skin scent almost instantly on me. Perhaps penhaligons chemistry doesnt work on me?<br />
<br />
Finally, i got fed up with it and had to wash, it literally turned into an antibacterial hand soap on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1083228"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1083228#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1081375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1081375" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="toushiroumimi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1140532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="toushiroumimi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Paris-Venise-49696.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49696.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paris  Venise"title="Paris  Venise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1081375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1081375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);
