I definitely get the spicy citrusy notes in here but for the price of this I expected more...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1081375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1081375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1075771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1075771" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rory1234"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rory1234" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Anfas/Samaha-44443.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44443.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Samaha"title="Samaha"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1075771ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1075771" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170040">Rory1234</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-04">07/04/19 07:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first Penhaligon purchase.      Love this stuff</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1075771"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1075771#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1075754" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1075754" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Andy the Frenchy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1165781.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Andy the Frenchy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1075754ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1075754" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1165781">Andy the Frenchy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-07-04">07/04/19 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion is Penhaligon's lavender-centered reference fragrance. I prefer the original (this one) over the Concentree flanker, as it's rounder, better balanced imo.<br />
<br />
A beautiful lavender with a hint of sweetness (but not boorish like in Lothair). Still, my favourite interpretations of lavender are Lutens' ones.<br />
<br />
Spring/Fall days, 25+</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1075754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1075754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1073354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1073354" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alanitoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230249"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.230249.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alanitoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1073354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1073354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/230249">Alanitoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-26">06/26/19 06:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love Endymion, it has the perfect balance between fresh notes and slightly sweet notes, it doesn't smell of strong lavender (which i don't like in other fragrances). i'm surprised it has been voted as the most prominent note. <br />
<br />
I didn't like it at first, it smelled like an average scent, but 30 mins later it completely evolved, i will definitely consider purchasing a full bottle. and they're a cruelty free company.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1073354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1073354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1062951" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1062951" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chrisk252"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chrisk252" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cerruti/1881-Men-329.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.329.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1881 Men"title="1881 Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1062951ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1062951" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185528">chrisk252</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-05-22">05/22/19 08:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Classy, well dressed gentleman vibe. Bit of tobacco, bit sweet, fougere. Easier to wear than Sartorial. Very nice. 8.5-9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1062951"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1062951#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1054649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1054649" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zhiang0113"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1173932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1173932.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zhiang0113" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Vanilla-Romance-96320.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96320.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Romance"title="Vanilla Romance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1054649ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1054649" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1173932">zhiang0113</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-04-26">04/26/19 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a rather intriguing fragrance.<br />
<br />
On first sniff, I caught wafts of a hazy smokiness of coffee and lavender - in my mind, I saw a sharply dressed gentleman browsing through an old book with faded, yellow pages. This oozes sophistication.<br />
<br />
It does get slightly more herbal and sweet towards the drydown though, likely due to the myrrh - I'm not too sure if I like this development, but I'll try it on again sometime. I think this will need a few wears before I know what I truly feel about this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1054649"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1054649#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1044382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1044382" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Purpose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1110785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Purpose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1044382ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1044382" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110785">Purpose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-24">03/24/19 17:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion by Penhaligons is a nice fragrance.<br />
<br />
This was a blind buy and it is a really nice fragrance. Its an old school barbershop type of scent with lavender spices and coffee. Upon application what I got were strong Lavender and coffee with spices in the background. The opening takes a minute to get used to because its so different than what Im used to smelling. I can feel that European influence right away but its one that I find myself having trouble getting used to. The coffee and spices dry down is nice and pleasant, spicy and warm. Unfortunately performance is very weak but thats to be expected from an EDC. Its a nice clean barbershop scent. Never thick or heavy. Its nice and different but too weak. An anytime scent and enjoyable for those that like barbershop scents. I liked it but not a love. I had to get rid of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1044382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1044382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1039227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1039227" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreshTones"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1069218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreshTones" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Superz/Sweet-Darkness-79431.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79431.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Darkness"title="Sweet Darkness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1039227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1039227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1069218">FreshTones</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-03-08">03/08/19 21:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a comfort scent. I legitimately only wear this one at night and it puts me to sleep. Not to say it's boring, it just has that calming lavender effect. Presentation.. Well, it's Penhaligon's. Cool bottle, great sprayer. I wish they would do away with the stickers and do all their bottles like Blasted Heath (etching) but... Still quality. Looks good.<br />
<br />
Lavender piledriver. About as masculine a lavender as you are going to get. Barbershoppy (is that a word?). There's a lot going on in this one and it is an exquisite blend.. However, it's fairly linear. Not to fret, it's linear in the most pleasing way possible. Lavender dominant, bergamot adding a touch of brightness, coffee and leather adding depth, sage adding spice. When it does change, it loses some of it's brightness to the myrrh, sandalwood and incense but it generally stays the same. Again, VERY lavender based. If you do not like that note, you will not like this.<br />
<br />
Endymion has a strange quality to it. Alluring, complicated and mysterious but not in a "bad boy" kind of way. More in the vein of an introverted intellectual. Captivating and sexy because of it. It flirts with being a dandy type of scent but is decidedly masculine. I think this is for sure versatile in any way possible (except maybe a dead humid summer heat). Dressed down, dressed up, no age hang ups... It's a utility scent. Sophisticated enough for a suit, relaxed enough for jeans. Hell, I wear it in my PJs most of the time. The downfall with Endymion is it's strength. As an EDC, it lives up to it's stated concentration but it's not a dramatic underperformer. It lasts for about 4-5 hours with about 30-45 minutes of walloping sillage. After that, very nice skin scent that people will still detect, although it may be just a glimmer of spicy lavender. I really love this stuff and I'd buy (and wear religiously) an EDP if it smelled exactly the same and didn't cost an arm and a leg. It personifies my attitude in a scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1039227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1039227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1030876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1030876" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BoxOfRain23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1042017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1042017.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BoxOfRain23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-613.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.613.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste"title="Egoiste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1030876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1030876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1042017">BoxOfRain23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-13">02/13/19 06:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update February 2019: Layering this with Atelier's Orange Sanguine has elevated this to "in love" from simply "love." OS front loads some brightness and energy, which moves the heart and base of Endymion up a few notches. The richness of the coffee note is accentuated with this layering recipe. Really nice winter mix!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1030876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1030876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1023168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1023168" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aqcmme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/429883"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aqcmme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aramis/Tobacco-Reserve-50564.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50564.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Reserve"title="Tobacco Reserve"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1023168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1023168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/429883">aqcmme</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-22">01/22/19 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As an uncultured nose swept along by the designer frags, I decided to swim against the flow and take on the waves of niche fragrances. Little did I know, it's an even bigger shark pool of expensive smells LOL.<br />
<br />
Endymion marks my first encounter with a niche, I like it alot, it smells of quality, opens sugary sweet and has a powder that evolves slightly but does not go away long into the drydown. I can't tell the precise notes as I am untrained but I like it enough to buy a bottle. I do get a bit of coffee, some spiciness and sandalwoods. To me the scent is quite linear and not too complex (read I have an uncouth nose), for the money longevity is disappointing but however fleeting, it was a great scent.<br />
<br />
A woman can definitely wear this too as there it has some floral and powder. On the dry down it's more masculine. Smelling it as I write I would reiterate the quality I smell here and would give this a buy recommendation. It's safe, not a standout; but alluring if worn at night for dates.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1023168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1023168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1015552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1154133">alexsuditu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-01-01">01/01/19 06:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Their bottles look amazing, their stores are stylish but Im wondering how is Penhaligons stil selling its perfumes as long as theyre better niche houses at more affordable prices. Penhligons - overpriced , boring scents with a mature vibe. Ive tried many of their perfumes but none of them made me fall in love with this brand. Their lasting power on my skin is 20-30 minutes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1015552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1015552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1008086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1006491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BoxOfRain23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1042017"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1042017.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BoxOfRain23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-613.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.613.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste"title="Egoiste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1006491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1006491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1042017">BoxOfRain23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-12-03">12/03/18 14:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance but I'm not sure I'm IN LOVE with it. I've settled on it as an autumn unfolding into winter perfume. It's moody but comforting. It bursts forth with such incredible balance, the bergamot, sandalwood, lavender and cardamom comingling so harmoniously I almost become enraptured. Almost. Time passes. The composition holds steady. It's the longed for kiss that you desperately desire with that person who is always just a step away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1006491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1006491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1005035" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1005035" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chinook"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/293892"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.293892.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chinook" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1005035ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1005035" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/293892">chinook</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-11-28">11/28/18 16:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample because Endymion was Sailor Moons boyfriend, together with the little moon logo, i was very intrigued. It opens up smelling extremely clean, like a bar of soap, or a hospital. Then the coffee and the rest (myrrh, cinnamon, vetiver etc) comes out, adding some warmth and sweetness. Overall vibe is classy and sleek, and sits close to skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="1005035"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=1005035#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent997068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc997068" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="echo4kilo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="echo4kilo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FZOTIC/Room-237-30364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Room 237"title="Room 237"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma997068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd997068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); I tried it on and it has a pleasant smell. None of the notes stick out in particular but for some reason it reminds me of dial soap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="997068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=997068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent985868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc985868" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Muchacho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078497"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078497.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Muchacho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Mr-Burberry-Eau-de-Parfum-43525.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43525.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum"title="Mr. Burberry Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma985868ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd985868" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);
