align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="985868"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=985868#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent984318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc984318" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jack Mnemonic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164313"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1164313.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jack Mnemonic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma984318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd984318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164313">Jack Mnemonic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-22">09/22/18 11:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the first fragrance I can't even notice. Awful!<br />
I was expecting notes of lavender and coffee but there are none of them.<br />
<br />
The most dissapointing fragrance I've ever had.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="984318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=984318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent979538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc979538" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GRAF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.727556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GRAF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-Haarlem-3258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New Haarlem"title="New Haarlem"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma979538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd979538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556">GRAF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-07">09/07/18 04:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion is a classic &amp; simple lavender scent, quite manly (but I can see a woman wearing it), suitable for spring &amp; summer, mainly daytime. Great versatility, extremelly safe and soft. I get mainly strong lavender, mild creamy coffee and some citruses mainly bergamot. <br />
<br />
The performance is moderate overall. This is not a new smell for me so I'm not impressed but it's a decent scent. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="979538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=979538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent973331" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc973331" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aaron_luke_e"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1072639.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aaron_luke_e" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Black-Phantom-43632.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43632.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Phantom"title="Black Phantom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma973331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd973331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1072639">aaron_luke_e</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-19">08/19/18 21:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligons Endymion is a stunning modern take on an old school Lavender based fragrance. This fragrance opens up with a very sharp and abrasive lavender/geranium  with a dose of citrus like Bergamot and a slight spice from the Cardamon. Then the scents dries down into this lovely sandalwood, myrrh, coffee, cardamon and black pepper scent. Such a lovely fragrance that last on my skin quiet a long time. Yes, it is not the strongest projector. But, I can get whiffs off of my skin 7 hours after I have applied the fragrance. <br />
<br />
If you like old school fragrances, but want a new take on it. Endymion is the one for you. One of my absolute favorite fragrances that I will always have in my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="973331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=973331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent963385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc963385" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chopster"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141517"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chopster" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma963385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd963385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1141517">chopster</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-19">07/19/18 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous creamy Sandalwood, smooth coffee and silky lavender. This is smooth, warm and classy and for an EDC lasts 5 hours on me. <br />
All the other listed notes don't stand out, they just blend together really well.<br />
Top notch.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="963385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=963385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent960506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc960506" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zesty_calco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1005584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zesty_calco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geoffrey-Beene/Grey-Flannel-4608.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4608.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grey Flannel"title="Grey Flannel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma960506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd960506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005584">zesty_calco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-10">07/10/18 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lavender, coffee, a woody herbal musky base. Smooth sandalwood; noticeable balsamic sweetness from the myrhh. The notes all smell high quality. Fairly fresh and clean without a barbershop vibe. Interesting use of coffee.<br />
<br />
Endymion leans slightly masculine and mature but I think anyone could pull this off. Fine for work; not really sexy. Performs decently for an eau de cologne. Lasted about four hours on me. A little pricey for what you get but not awful. I'm enjoying this. It's pleasant if not a little safe. There's nothing challenging here but nothing wrong with that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="960506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=960506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent947893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc947893" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bubbles1964"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1095199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1095199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bubbles1964" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bastide-Aix-en-Provence/Figue-Amour-48974.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48974.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Figue Amour"title="Figue Amour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma947893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd947893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1095199">Bubbles1964</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-30">05/30/18 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sampling from a Penhaligon's scent library sample pack. This was the last one I tried and it's my favorite. <br />
<br />
This smells like a vintage coffee shop that also sells used books, and it's comforting on a cool spring day in the Pacific Northwest. I pick up the lavender first and it's dominant for the first 20 minutes. Turns to the coffee and nutmeg notes with other herbs in the middle. <br />
<br />
The dry down is more sweet and feminine leaning, but still masculine enough to be gender neutral. I really fell in love fast with this one, so much that within 2 hours of wearing it I ordered a small bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="947893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=947893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent946660" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc946660" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kndy38"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/619912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kndy38" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Pacific-Chill-81423.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81423.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pacific Chill"title="Pacific Chill"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma946660ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd946660" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/619912">kndy38</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-26">05/26/18 09:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my. I bought a sample along with some MFK fragrances.<br />
<br />
This one stands out. Shares some similarities with Masculin pluriel but it is soooo addictive. Sweet yet masculine. Classy. Discret. A bit too shy projection wise.<br />
It reminds me of Eau des baux in the drydown. I can still smell this after 1 day... Moisturize ur skin guys !<br />
<br />
But I'm still going to buy a bottle. And the deodorant. It is THAT GOOD.<br />
<br />
Would totally see this as a signature fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="946660"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=946660#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent940783" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc940783" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jacobbonilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/290918"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.290918.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jacobbonilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Oriza-L-Legrand/Relique-D-Amour-16255.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16255.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Relique D'Amour"title="Relique D'Amour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma940783ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd940783" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/290918">jacobbonilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-05-08">05/08/18 18:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The note breakdown is phenomenal to me! I seriously couldnt ask for a better note line up than this. What I get most is the coffee and lavender , sage and lime just like the people voted. Theyre not lying. For the first 45 min or so it seems like a sparkling lime lavender coffee jumping off the skin, I guess just barely bouncing lol because the fragrance is fairly close to the skin. I heard someone from Penhaligon mention that their fragrances whisper rather than shout which is pretty accurate.       Perfect for date night or cuddling with that special someone. I like to wear it for myself as well, even before bed its kind of a treat, the coffee might keep you awake but the lavender will tuck you right in.       Penhaligon is a terrific house especially for the price. I highly recommend checking this one out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="940783"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=940783#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent930863" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc930863" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chris3Hs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984429"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chris3Hs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma930863ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd930863" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/984429">Chris3Hs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-04-08">04/08/18 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Think YSL L'homme, but the niche version. Higher quality ingredients and better blended.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="930863"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=930863#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent884956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc884956" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blumeprinz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/904951"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.904951.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blumeprinz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-523.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.523.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme"title="Allure Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma884956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd884956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/904951">blumeprinz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-29">11/29/17 09:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I woke with a start at 5:00 this morning, drenched in sweat, a churn in my stomach. I had taken way too high a dosage of cough medicine, and my body was not happy about it. Dry heave - okay, I guess it's fine now.<br />
<br />
After dealing with that, the last thing I wanted to do was go to work, but circumstances left me with no choice. I needed something light, not too spicy, smooth. Please no giant "scent cloud" today. Just something nice, pleasant, barely there.<br />
<br />
I reached for my sample of Endymion, knowing its Eau de Cologne concentration wouldn't be so intrusive, and the second I sprayed (and dabbed the residual dribble) I knew I made the right choice. Despite having to drag myself to work, it's as if Endymion tucked me back into bed and smooched me on the forehead. Nothing else in my collection does this, and if it tries, it's way too loud to be effective.<br />
<br />
Previously, I'd written Endymion off as a waste of money. Why would I get this wimpy creamy coffee scent when I have Pure Coffee? Okay, past me. Time for a lecture: You're not always going to want to smell like a dark roast black coffee. Sometimes you're going to want to smell like a local cafe around the holidays - warm, inviting, coffee smells lingering with bakery smells, bakery smells lingering with the faint whiff of a stranger's perfume.<br />
<br />
I see my fragrance collection as a support system, in a way. It helps me see myself how I wish to be seen, it helps when I'm feeling depressed, it helps when I'm bored. Endymion is the fragrance equivalent of that friend who can sense when you need a hand to hold. He starts out as a hug and dries down to your dear friend, holding your hand, giving it gentle strokes when he hears so much as a sniffle out of you. Endymion is the friend I'm ready to welcome onto my shelf.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="884956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=884956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent884108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc884108" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="josevancouver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/70887"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.70887.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="josevancouver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma884108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd884108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/70887">josevancouver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-26">11/26/17 18:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's dark and cloudy and there is a chill in the air. I'm wearing Penhaligon's Endymion and enjoying this warm, spicy and alluring scent once again. <br />
<br />
Endymion smells amazing. The opening notes of lavender blended with coffee in the heart and leather, musk, cardamon and sandalwood makes this an appealing and attractive scent<br />
<br />
Despite the fact this fragrance is a cologne concentration, I actually get decent projection and longevity. It is so well blended and has so many notes that I appreciate in fragrances - most notably lavender, coffee, sandalwood and cardamon, that when I wear this scent after months of not wearing it, I am left wondering why I don't wear this enough. <br />
<br />
Smooth, sexy and appealing. Definitely another scent (like Prada L'Homme Intense) that has a mysterious and alluring vibe to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="884108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=884108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent873196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc873196" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="theironsbook"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1092198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="theironsbook" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Florentine-Iris-16189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Florentine Iris"title="Florentine Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma873196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd873196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1092198">theironsbook</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-22">10/22/17 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Once tried in a shop - ordered everything from the official website.<br />
Stress or whatever - Endymion bath oil and I am in heaven.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="873196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=873196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent870814" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc870814" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blueslippers"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/992218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.992218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blueslippers" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eternal-Oud-78155.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78155.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternal Oud"title="Eternal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma870814ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd870814" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/992218">Blueslippers</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-14">10/14/17 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is fantastic. A powdery, floral, soft coffee. Ideal for evenings and cooler weather wear.<br />
<br />
This is in my top 5 and it's incredibly well blended. Longevity is fine for me, I get 4-6 hours. It's not beastly in terms of projection, but neither should it be. It's a soft, intimate, sensual fragrance and it's not been designed to overpower the room!<br />
<br />
I currently have 3 Penhaligon's in my collection (this, Sartorial and Opus 1870) .I enjoy them all, but this is the best by far. Up there with Creeds Royal Oud and ADP's leather as a top quality Autumn/Winter staple!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="870814"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=870814#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent868730" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc868730" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JohnMc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/46451"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.46451.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JohnMc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma868730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd868730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/46451">JohnMc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-08">10/08/17 08:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a Brit, I find Penhaligons as a brand to be somewhat cliched in as much as they sell a kind of faux-vintage British fragrance fantasy where style is king over substance.  The quality and composition just doesn't live up to the hype with most fragrances they produce; Endymion is the exception to that rule and is sensuous and attractive, in a gourmand, sweet way.  If old-English-style fragrances interest you, try those by Geo F. Trumper which are just as varied, but come in at one third of the price of Penhaligons over-priced and stylised offerings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="868730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=868730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent849866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc849866" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jigginssean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034490"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1034490.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jigginssean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-9828.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9828.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus"title="Aventus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma849866ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd849866" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1034490">jigginssean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-10">08/10/17 13:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I originally intended to blind buy this but thought i would play it safe and get a sample first. I do like it, not offensive in the slightest but i find it to be a bit too light and powdery for my personal taste so probably won't end up getting a bottle. I like the name of it, Endymion. Sounds dark and mischievous, wanted a bit more power from the fragrance itself though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="849866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=849866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent843953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc843953" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodlandwalk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11394.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodlandwalk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kingdom-Scotland/Metamorphic-53987.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53987.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Metamorphic"title="Metamorphic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma843953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd843953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394">woodlandwalk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-22">07/22/17 16:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Elegant, contemporary, with a classic edge, though distinct this is neither heavy, overwhelming nor obvious.<br />
<br />
A male friend of mine wears this (we collaborate together on arts projects). <br />
Anyway, I often noticed a lovely scent around him and thought it was the combo of him and a leather jacket, but when I was in his flat I had a sniff of the bottle of Endymion on a shelf and said 'aha!' this is what smells so good.<br />
<br />
Clearly I notice the leather, but also other notes I love such as nutmeg, and the citruses. Lavender, sage and coffee lend the masculine touch, also what I think is a hint of bitter raw tobacco which really works with the dark fruity touch. I like the fact it's neither macho nor feminine. Yes as others here note, there's a romantic edge, very suitable for a cultured or artsy gentleman, but it does have a contemporary feel.<br />
<br />
It has a subtle darkness - I'd say it's suited to evening or winter but it would depend on the person wearing it. Definitely one of my favourites from Penhaligon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="843953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=843953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent826074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc826074" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spumyland"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.189882.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spumyland" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maher-Olfactive/Santal-Auster-60618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Santal Auster"title="Santal Auster"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma826074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd826074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/189882">spumyland</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-26">05/26/17 01:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Non il mio tipo ma un classico piacevole.<br />
Partenza con schiuma da barba dolce ma tonica con lavanda e agrumi in testa.<br />
Si amalgama in breve tempo.<br />
bella armonia.<br />
Buono per addolcire la rasatura quotidiana di pelli mature.<br />
Over 40</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="826074"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=826074#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent826034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc826034" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vinyl_junky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vinyl_junky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/GFT-5004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="GFT"title="GFT"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma826034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd826034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736">vinyl_junky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-25">05/25/17 20:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this as a gift from my girlfriend, who's trying to wean me off my dependence on citrus fragrances. With Endymion, I think she might just succeed!<br />
<br />
This is a very unique, complex fragrance that's tough to pin down. While you could consider this an oriental spicy fragrance, it could as easily be a fougere, given that it has the classic notes for both. I would describe it as a sophisticated, masculine, floral-woody fragrance, if that makes sense. <br />
<br />
The open is a lovely lavender and sage with a hint of citrus, primarily bergamot. The coffee quickly kicks in, and these notes are sustained through the drydown. As it develops it gets pleasantly powdery, which I first thought was tonka. Since that's not listed, I suspect it's from the incense. <br />
<br />
While the fragrance sounds quite complex, it's not. I think this one of the few fragrances that you could wear anytime of the day, and any season.<br />
<br />
As some of the reviews have noted, it smells a bit like a chocolate dessert. My girlfriend put it best when she said "like eating chocolate truffles in a forest".<br />
<br />
Longevity is good on this, I get around 5 hours. Sillage is moderate, which is probably best on a fragrance like this - you wouldn't want this getting overwhelming.<br />
<br />
Edit: for girlfriend's comments. It's chocolate truffles, not cake apparently...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="826034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=826034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent819624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc819624" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SirCharles"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/732302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="SirCharles" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Viking-41698.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41698.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Viking"title="Viking"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma819624ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd819624" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/732302">SirCharles</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-05-04">05/04/17 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Remember that scene in Spectre when Bond and Madeleine are having dinner on the train? This is the scent Bond would have been wearing. Soft, intimate, classic, masculine. Kinda reminds me of a really, really nice shaving cream. This is the type of fragrance that makes people fall in love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="819624"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=819624#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent816774" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc816774" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sandroadv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1059281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1059281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sandroadv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Green-Irish-Tweed-474.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.474.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Irish Tweed"title="Green Irish Tweed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma816774ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd816774" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1059281">sandroadv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-04-26">04/26/17 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great juice.<br />
Somehow reminds me Intuition for Men Este Lauder or Allure de Chanel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="816774"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=816774#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent793891" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc793891" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MEOWITSTERRA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/585360"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.585360.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MEOWITSTERRA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Rose-Jam-2019-63243.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63243.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Jam 2019"title="Rose Jam 2019"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma793891ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd793891" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/585360">MEOWITSTERRA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-17">02/17/17 15:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get lavender, cardamom, and sage right away. There's also this sweet, green soapiness for the first few minutes and I think that's because of the vetiver and geranium. <br />
<br />
As it develops I'm able to detect the incense and suede in a very subtle way. It's tone is slightly powdery, but ultimately warm and intimate. <br />
<br />
For all the interesting notes listed, it really does not wear overly complicated, so it's safe to wear in close quarters.<br />
<br />
It's very gentlemanly to me, but as woman-folk, I'm really enjoying wearing this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="793891"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=793891#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent772928" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc772928" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gedlive"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866522.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gedlive" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Equipage-7.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Equipage"title="Equipage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma772928ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd772928" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866522">gedlive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-12-21">12/21/16 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OK, this is a very nice fougere. It is not an oriental spicy. The balsamic notes listed are very much in the background, hardly noticable.<br />
What I get is mostly lavender and sandalwood, and some vanilic tonka, though none listed. Beyond those predominant notes, I did pick up on the coffee before looking at the note pyramid. Then I do get a nice bit of orange and bergamot freshness.<br />
<br />
So it's a common fougere scent like Egoist Platinum, or Floris Homme. But it is very smooth and good quality, the balsams give it a bit more warmth and depth than many similar fougeres.<br />
<br />
It does have the coffee which I like and some other nice spices that makes it stand out from other good fougeres.<br />
I think I will get Endymion when my Chanel Egoist Planinum runs out...<br />
<br />
OK, it is getting warmer and sweeter in the mid, and a bit gourmand, a bit of maple nuttiness. So think ,a good fougere for colder months. Very smooth and un-synthetic smelling...<br />
<br />
Rating: 8/10<br />
<br />
Merry Christmas.  John 3:16</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="772928"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=772928#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent768781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc768781" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="INJEN"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/66713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.66713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="INJEN" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/Havana-Vanille-Vanille-Absolument-6745.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6745.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Havana Vanille (Vanille Absolument)"title="Havana Vanille (Vanille Absolument)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma768781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd768781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/66713">INJEN</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-12-08">12/08/16 22:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells delicious ; Like some kind of chocolate desert , My wife love this scent on me , Last longer on clothing , Than it will on skin, But blast your self with abut 12 sprays and it will sure last a few hours, <br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Silage - Moderate<br />
Long lasting 5/10<br />
Thanks,</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="768781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=768781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent766433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc766433" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Manny44"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/689591"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.689591.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Manny44" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/La-Nuit-de-l-Homme-5521.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5521.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit de l'Homme"title="La Nuit de l'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma766433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd766433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/689591">Manny44</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-12-02">12/02/16 01:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yuuup....Longevity issues....less than 3 hours and you'll be digging your nose into your skin to find it. Great (like really great ) coffee note though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="766433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=766433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent765373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
