padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/961762">bugsyiii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-11-28">11/28/16 17:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance; nothing ground breaking or unique (IMO) yet, linear; realized that you can get this same aroma for less in Armani Code, yes this reminds me of the soft almost powdery feeling in AC formerly, Armani Black Code. <br />
<br />
Nice fragrance!~</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="765373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=765373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent764780" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc764780" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="a bennett"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1032028"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="a bennett" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma764780ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd764780" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1032028">a bennett</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-11-26">11/26/16 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance <br />
 Why compare to la nuit de l' homme,armani and many others Endymion has been around since 2003 all others compare to endymion. <br />
I see some problems with performance issues however, this is great on my skin, projects nice for 2 hours and lasts all in all about 5-6 hours for an eau de cologne that is great.<br />
Hats off to Penhaligons for this great spicy,fresh and uplifting fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="764780"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=764780#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent762536" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc762536" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mrluctoretemergo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/176013"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.176013.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mrluctoretemergo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Herms"title="Terre d'Herms"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma762536ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd762536" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/176013">mrluctoretemergo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-11-19">11/19/16 09:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>long story short - ok scent<br />
<br />
longevity : non-existing<br />
 <br />
=&gt; don't blind buy unless you don't mind carrying your bottle with you the whole time because you'll have to re-apply every ten minutes or so...a disgrace to ask so much money for an eau-de-not much..<br />
<br />
Update : after a long time i used this fellow again but sprayed quite a lot on my shirt...and Then it smells wonderfull for a whole working day...pleasantly surprised.. <br />
<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="762536"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=762536#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent753784" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc753784" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kanak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/58220"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.58220.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kanak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baldessarini/Strictly-Private-5202.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5202.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Strictly Private"title="Strictly Private"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma753784ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd753784" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/58220">kanak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-10-20">10/20/16 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon's Endymion starts with a bracing citrus lavender. The Lavender is the star player here and is joined by a coffee note in the heart. Again, coffee here is coffee as in coffee grounds, not a milky latte or cappucino.  The base to my nose is mostly a mild leather with spices, incense, and maybe a hint of sandalwood and musk. This is one of those frags that seems to have a lot of notes going on but actually on skin is pretty simple and straightforward. This is pretty much a spicy lavender frag with a dash of citrus, leather, incense and woody musk. Projection is good for the first hour or so and then settles. Longevity seems to be around the 5 hour mark on me. <br />
Penhaligon is old school British style and Endymion does not rock that boat. Safe for office or any other formal occasion or even a family get together. Your grandma wont be offended if you give her a hug wearing this if you know what I mean. The words that come to mind are clean, professional, well mannered, squared away, etc.  If you work in an office in formal clothes or have occasion to wear a suit n tie in your normal routine, Endymion has a place in your wardrobe. This is like a good silk tie or soft high quality, leather Brogues, adds a touch of class to the whole ensemble and one can never be short of those.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="753784"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=753784#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent750379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc750379" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hcrv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013877"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1013877.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hcrv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma750379ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd750379" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1013877">hcrv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-10-09">10/09/16 08:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>No silly/ridiculous novellas posted here regarding life's journey and how it relates to this fragrance or strange interpretation of how this fragrance reminds one of a song. Simply, this is a well crafted fragrance. I definetely smell the lavender in the opening and sandlewoid/incense in the base notes. A great fragrance for the evening out on the town or when on a date. Lasts about 6 hours and has moderate sillage. I wouldn't necessarily consider this a fragrance for work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="750379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=750379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent748612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc748612" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LJT"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1021156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LJT" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Brioni/Brioni-Eau-de-Parfum-Essentiel-82015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Brioni Eau de Parfum Essentiel"title="Brioni Eau de Parfum Essentiel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma748612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd748612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1021156">LJT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-10-03">10/03/16 06:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm fortunate enough to live near a Penhaligon's emporium so visit whenever there's a new scent to try.<br />
New releases are quite regular but this is one of my favourites of theirs. The coffee and bergamot dominate to my nose but the other ingredients underpin them so well.<br />
According to the staff in the shop lack of longevity is the main complaint but I guess I'm lucky because I get a good 8 hours.<br />
If I can't decide which scent to wear on a particular day then this is my go to as it seems to work for any occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="748612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=748612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent744092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc744092" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Max Logan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/965986"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.965986.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Max Logan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Paprika-Brasil-2675.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2675.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Paprika Brasil"title="Hermessence Paprika Brasil"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma744092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd744092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/965986">Max Logan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-09-19">09/19/16 18:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Balanced, sophisticated, not sweet, not soapy, fresh, but no cheap lemon etc. <br />
<br />
I read lots of cool sandal wood, leather and black pepper. Perfection. <br />
<br />
Longevity is poor. But the scent itself is too amazing to pay attention to such small hiccup.<br />
<br />
Total love.<br />
<br />
P.S. Can be worn as "unisex"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="744092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=744092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent725675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc725675" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yowzer-Pei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1011378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1011378.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yowzer-Pei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Winter-Palace-55377.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55377.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Winter Palace"title="Winter Palace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma725675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd725675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1011378">Yowzer-Pei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-07-22">07/22/16 05:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion is a contrast of smells with a spicy base and wonderful harmony of the citrus along with everything else. Masterfully blended. It's a gentlemanly scent and fits quite well with the small smell bubble reputation that it has. Meant to be mostly enjoyed in private in my mind. For me anyway, the smell remains even after a full day at work. A keeper and a bottle which will get replenished as it empties..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="725675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=725675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent724302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc724302" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cizekon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1004149"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cizekon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lanvin/Lanvin-L-Homme-6094.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6094.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lanvin L'Homme"title="Lanvin L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma724302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd724302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1004149">cizekon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-07-17">07/17/16 15:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion is one of the most beautiful scents I have ever smelled. Well balanced, sweet (but not too sweet) and classy. As many people have already described, it projects 1 hour, max 90 minutes. After that it stays 2 more hours as a skin scent.<br />
<br />
Despite that, I got some great compliments with it, especially during closed encounters with girls. I really think this is the best way how to use this fragrance, since the scent itself is so smooth and sexy, but doesnt project so much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="724302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=724302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent722434" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc722434" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lucywan18"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009850"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lucywan18" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5674.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Endymion"title="Endymion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma722434ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd722434" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1009850">Lucywan18</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-07-11">07/11/16 02:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sometimes it just smells like ordinary men cologne u can find anywhere. But its dry down is amazing and has a sexy powdery and woody scent. Not too odd to wear it on me but it only smells feminine if smell closely. The projection smells manly and a bit different from what it smells on the skin. The concentrate version is more long lasting but the scent is not 100% the same. <br />
<br />
For longevity, i think it only lasts for an hour on me. Projection is weak too. <br />
<br />
The concentrate version lasts longer for around 3 hours. And it smells more feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="722434"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=722434#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent721718" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is the one fragrance that always draws compliments from even random people on the street.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="721718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=721718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent709002" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This one is for its deodorant stick. I used it after shower the other morning  before I left the house for work and it projected at the office up until 5 pm. <br />
<br />
As in Cologne I don't get the coffee not, lavander is also a bit more subtle then in Cologne. Overall I am happy not to spend money on the Cologne with its weak performance but to its deodorant. My only concern is that there is Triclosan in its ingredients which is a carcinogen substance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="709002"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=709002#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent704503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc704503" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="groover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/613045"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.613045.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="groover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baldessarini/Signature-63010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Signature"title="Signature"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma704503ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd704503" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); all at once to create the perfect harmony and<br />
balance, its a masterpice in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="704503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=704503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent703624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc703624" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="atlaseetschristmas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/842607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.842607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="atlaseetschristmas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Slumberhouse/Fjerne-61819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fjerne"title="Fjerne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma703624ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd703624" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/842607">atlaseetschristmas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-08">05/08/16 14:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For a long time I overlooked Endymion as it seemed to me to be just another boring-ass lavender. After testing it out a ton (somewhat compulsively.. for some reason), I've come to truly appreciate it for it's subtleties and I think its quite a gem. It starts out as you would expect, with a warm and cozy lavender and some vague citrus, not especially complicated or engaging. The drydown is where Endymion shines. There is a toasty, warm gourmandish facet (not really coffee to me, but more of a hazelnut or a tonka-esque aroma) and an interesting, subtly smoky leather. Exceedingly pleasant and classically masculine while still being interesting in a non gimmicky way. Not exactly the kind of thing that fits my personal style, but very pleasing and worth a sniff! Performance is just average, I'm very very interested in the recently released concentr, I hope it retains this ones subtle pleasing character while fixing the lackluster performance. <br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="703624"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=703624#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent702068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc702068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PennGent~"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199526"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.199526.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PennGent~" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Egoiste-Platinum-614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Egoiste Platinum"title="Egoiste Platinum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma702068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd702068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199526">PennGent~</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-03">05/03/16 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>~ I thought I had smelled, tested, worn all the quintessential Gentleman scents up until I shook hands with this top hat, leather glove, lavender lapel wearing proper English Gentleman! This is perhaps the first serious contender to potentially dethrone my Signature Chanel? I am completely enamored with the perfection of Endymion's soft, sweet, confident personality. The lavender is so smooth so romantic this will surely please anyone who would accompany you on a Sunday drive or a fall walk in the park! This is warm and welcoming in it's subtle leather and musk base the perfect companion. I give this Penhaligon's an endorsement for any man who wants to bring his style to the next level and please many noses along the way!<br />
Kind Regards, Plat ~<br />
Scent - 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="702068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=702068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent686556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc686556" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VibeOil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/983457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.983457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="VibeOil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma686556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd686556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/983457">VibeOil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-13">03/13/16 14:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Endymion takes the top spot among the fragrances I own. Sure, its familiar - its been done in some form many, many times over - La Nuit, Spicebomb, LInstant, Pure Havane, Tobacco Vanille, Avant Garde - I can think of about a dozen others in the same neighborhood that I havent listed, but you get the idea. They may throw in honey or vanilla, some have leather or patchouli, some dont - or they dial up or down the sweetness and intensity, but essentially everythings built around a spicy/sweet lavender or tobacco heart (or both). I have a few of these, like them all and love a couple, but this one hits everything just right. Mild lavender, lightly sweet cocoa/coffee, mildly fruity, spicy and aromatic. Its the high quality of the blend that makes it a standout. Nothing shouts, everything works in subtle harmony, making Endymion much more versatile than other smell-alikes. Its a little on the weak side, but even that works in its favor, adding to its flexibilty in most occasions (except for hot days). Sometimes Penhaligons English sense of restraint gets the better of their fragrances, making what could be a standout blend so soft that the scent fades somewhere between leaving the bottle and hitting your skin. Juniper Sling and English Fern being two examples, Id buy em in a second if they had more oomph. This one, though - perfect!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="686556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=686556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent685266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc685266" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kim_klaus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/887330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.887330.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kim_klaus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma685266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd685266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/887330">kim_klaus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-09">03/09/16 12:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wouldn't mind to live in a world where all men were well acquainted with Endymion. In fact Endymion should be part of any education system. <br />
<br />
That would be a one fine world- living in style, with good manners and rich heritage of traditions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="685266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=685266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent673366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc673366" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steleale"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/833353"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.833353.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steleale" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma673366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd673366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/833353">Steleale</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-01">02/01/16 14:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I gave a small decant to my husband and I love the way it suits him. Endymion is a classy fragrance for a real gentleman. Penhaligon's British style is to die for. I will give Endymion to my husband as birthday present for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="673366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=673366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent671645" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc671645" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jozemo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/235122"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.235122.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jozemo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Eau-Pour-Homme-409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Eau Pour Homme"title="Armani Eau Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma671645ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd671645" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/235122">jozemo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-27">01/27/16 15:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I get dressed up and look for a traditional fragrance this is the one,very soft and masculine at the same time, you won't make a statement with this scent, but you will smell like a gentleman, the dry-down is superb with the right amount of spice to me, a modest amount on the skin and clothing will give you at least 4 hours of longevity which is normal these days, this is a Daddy fragrance, it is for the mature and confident wearer, that's right I said it! Daddy fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="671645"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=671645#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent669699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc669699" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fqjcior"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.3365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fqjcior" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma669699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd669699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3365">fqjcior</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-22">01/22/16 05:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Placing it next to the fenomenal Sartorial seems for me quite a misunderstanding. Endymion is miles away from Duchaufour's work. It lacks of almost everything: substance, sillage, projection, longlastiness. It is just a weak gourmandy cologne, I can't even detect on myself 15 minutes after I apply it. Big let down for me. Not succesful blind buy after all the positive reviews read here, especially the one of Mr. Colin Maillard who normally knows what he writes about... I give 5/10 here. :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="669699"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=669699#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent665336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc665336" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nhsrk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/978710"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.978710.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nhsrk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Different-Company/White-Zagora-18596.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18596.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Zagora"title="White Zagora"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma665336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd665336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/978710">nhsrk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-09">01/09/16 00:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The mythic inspiration behind this perfume is apt as it is one of the most gorgeous and frustrating perfumes I have tried--like chasing the moon.<br />
<br />
I sampled it a few times on my skin and was intrigued by how well-blended it was. This is a perfume of paradoxes--somewhat sweet, somewhat spicy. A lightness to it, but also a heft that could lend itself to use in the evening and any season really. The aromatic lavender and sage combination along with the hint of coffee and myrrh made me think of slightly sweet herbal medicines (a natural medicinal smell, not the antiseptic one of a hospital).<br />
For all its wondrous qualities, this doesn't last anywhere near as long as I would like it to. Granted, that might have something to do with it being a cologne. I get, perhaps, 4-4.5 hours tops (the last hours of its life spent laying flat against my skin). It's elusive and ephemeral.<br />
<br />
I did, however, take the plunge and purchase the set that came with the body gel and deodorant during Penhaligon's sale so I have less qualms about its poor longevity.<br />
Although this is marketed as a men's perfume, I ignore that (as should anyone who loves a specific scent) and wear it anyway. In fact, I'd like to smell this on more women just to compare.<br />
<br />
What can I say? I'm enchanted.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="665336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=665336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent655538" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc655538" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miracleborgtech"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/771398"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.771398.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miracleborgtech" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jar-Parfums/Ferme-tes-Yeux-15127.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15127.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ferme tes Yeux"title="Ferme tes Yeux"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma655538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd655538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/771398">miracleborgtech</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-12-09">12/09/15 20:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overall, Endymion is an exquisite perfume and I feel guilty about criticizing something this good. But in the spirit of analyzing my feelings, my main reaction was " Almost Heaven".  Frustrating in that there is a sense of just missing nirvana.  The main note is a high quality lavender, refined and elegant.  It is enhanced by a spellbinding spiciness, just extraordinary. But underlying,  there is a musky powdery aura, very faint, but it imperceptibly intrudes on the lavender and spices. It adds a touch of ordinary and constricts the euphoria you get smelling the lavender/spice accord. This touch of ordinary is akin to clay feet on a god, because Endymion truly is a masterpiece.  A timeless, beautiful fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="655538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=655538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent639592" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc639592" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="josevancouver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/70887"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.70887.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="josevancouver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Pegasus-16938.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16938.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pegasus"title="Pegasus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma639592ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd639592" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/70887">josevancouver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-10-16">10/16/15 20:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's getting cooler outside as Fall hits....and I've been reaching for one of my favourite fragrances, Penhaligon's Endymion. This is a beautiful, sexy-smelling fragrance. The coffee/lavender combo makes this a terrific fragrance to wear in the Fall.<br />
<br />
Not the most powerful fragrance, I have the matching deodorant and mix the fragrance with unscented moisturizer to stretch the strength of this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="639592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=639592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent636628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc636628" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vbjanos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/394286"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.394286.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vbjanos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Myrrh-45497.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45497.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Myrrh"title="Myrrh"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma636628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd636628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/394286">vbjanos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-10-07">10/07/15 02:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There is a coffee note in the background that is strong but not obvious. I love coffee and it turns out most people love it in Endymion too, without realising. The coffee and lavender gives it a relaxed vibe. The quality of materials and the complexity gives it class and elegance.<br />
<br />
The longevity and sillage are "adequate", to borrow the phrase from a Rolls Royce description.<br />
<br />
It is time for me to get a back-up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="636628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=636628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent633839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc623707" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ilsagold"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208639"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.208639.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ilsagold" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma623707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd623707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/208639">ilsagold</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-08-24">08/24/15 05:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A parfumery in Milan gave me couple of tester of Endymion and finally I spreyed it one evening just before I left the house to see a movie. At the end of 10 min. walk to cinema, I thought myself ''Wow, I'll be enjoying to use this tester until last drop''. Lucikly the Saloon was air conditioned, so while I sit for two hours me and wife quiet enjoyed the fragrance up until the end of that two hours. Unfortunatelly, the movie ended, the parfume has gone!<br />
<br />
Last week I tried it in a little warmer temperature, this time it didn't last even 2 hours and hasn't projected as it was in that chilled cinema saloon.<br />
<br />
With this price for a cologne concentration its not a bottle worthy. Otherwise I'd thinking of buying one until my last try.<br />
<br />
Normally I don't like the scent of lavander. But in this its quiet tolarable as it is surrended by other beautiful matching notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="623707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=623707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent613571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Whenever i get tired of heavy and loud fragrances, i usually turn to this gem.. I'm not a fan of lavender (except that of Musc Ravageur's) but this one is done right.. It's clean, a bit spicy and the drydown is slightly sweet and creamy.. For a cologne concentration, Endymion performs well!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="613571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=613571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent613414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc613414" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="richardjw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/855364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.855364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="richardjw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Narciso-Rodriguez-for-Him-Bleu-Noir-Eau-de-Parfum-47950.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47950.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narciso Rodriguez for Him Bleu Noir Eau de Parfum"title="Narciso Rodriguez for Him Bleu Noir Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma613414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd613414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/855364">richardjw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-07-19">07/19/15 04:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best things I've ever had the privilege to put my nose on, but unfortunately, this has the worst performance issues I've ever come to experience. Despite the terrible performance it has, I still bought a 100ml bottle of this because the smell is just that good! Perfect for close encounters with your loved one...<br />
Also, the price might be a bit too steep for what it is because of the performance issues, but if you don't really care much about that, it is definitely worth it!<br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10 amazing<br />
Longevity: 3/10<br />
Projection: 2/10<br />
<br />
Real shame because this is a masterpiece otherwise..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="613414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=613414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent613017" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I really enjoy wearing this. This to me is a romantic dream-like fragrance which I would classify as a masterpiece. I have often found friends of mine have fallen in love with this fragrance too. I really like how it is a calming smell. There is a subtle coffee smell that comes through and combines amazingly with the lavender. Whenever I spray this on myself I find I am constantly smelling my wrist as it takes you into a dream like world. This is a great perfume to wear for personal enjoyment. Lovely</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="613017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=613017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent604164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This fragrance to me is worth the extra money to smell amazing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="595727"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=595727#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent594879" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/53430">koala501</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-05-15">05/15/15 02:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another Penhaligon's I had to have for winter &amp; cooler months. I passed a lady today at the shops, she was with what I suppose was her daughter and I heard them both remark on how good I smelled. I always knew this was a winner. I must keep applying as my skin eats this but the lavender, blended with coffee, a dusty nutmeg &amp; a soft leather barely perceptible in the base makes this a wonderful masculine. Could be deadly on a lady too!!! This is another staple of my wardrobe which I can dress up or down. Beauty in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="5674"comment_id="594879"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Endymion-5674.html?ccid=594879#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent586617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
